title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to the CNN Learning Modules
This website provides a gentle introduction to Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
designed for students with no prior programming or machine learning experience.
All coding is done in the cloud using Google Colab â€” no installation is required.
